#summary RS232Test tool on-line help
<wiki:toc max_depth="1" />

= Introduction =
RS232Test is simple serial terminal that allows entering and displaying received data either in text or binary (HEX) mode.

= Command Line options =

|| `-h, --help`  || Show command line options ||
|| `-c, --connect`  || Automatically connect to port after starting ||
|| `--config=cfgfile`  || Configuration file. If not defined then Registry will be used ||
|| `-p, --port=port name`  || Port file name that should be selected ||
|| `-l, --log[=log file]`  || Dump output to log file (in HTML format) with provided name or default file name if [log file] parameter is not provided.<BR>Auto log file name format:<BR>`Rs232test2_yyyy-MM-dd_hh.mm.ss.zzz.log.html` ||
|| `-i, --inmode=mode`  || Edit mode. <BR> Possible `<mode>` values:<BR>`hex|h` - HEX <BR>`ascii|a` - ASCII <BR>`cstr|c` - C-like string ||
|| `-o, --outmode=mode`  || Display mode. <BR>Possible `<mode>` values:<BR>`hex|h` - HEX <BR>`ascii|a` - ASCII <BR>`cstr|c` - C-like string ||
